guestbook.successDescription: Thank you for your valuable message!

intro.name: a frontend developer.
intro.about:
I enjoy frontend development that considers user experience
and code reusability, and I love improving inefficient processes.
I strive to become a better developer through continuous learning and growth.

features.title: Core Competencies
features.description:
A frontend developer who values communication and collaboration,
solves problems with persistence, and grows together with the team.

cards.title: Modern Frontend Development
cards.desc: I develop frontend applications based on React and TypeScript. I have experience using Tanstack Query, React Router, Zustand, and server-side rendering with Next.js.

cards.title: Website Maintenance & Optimization
cards.desc: I continuously improve websites and focus on optimizing user experience. I've achieved 70% FCP and 46% LCP performance improvements through code splitting, bundle analysis, lazy loading, and image optimization.

cards.title: Communication & Collaboration
cards.desc: I have experience working on projects through collaboration with planners, designers, and developers. I believe good communication leads to good results, so I value clear exchange of opinions in teamwork.

skills.title: Tech Stack & Tools
skills.description: Technologies I can currently use and those I'm learning.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Key projects where I learned and implemented new technologies.

desc: Acquired semantic markup implementation skills considering web standards and accessibility
Developed modern frontend development capabilities using TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS
Enhanced practical skills through Git/GitHub-based collaboration and team projects
Gained integrated perspective on the entire process from planning to development and cross-disciplinary collaboration skills
Acquired user-centered interface design methodology based on UI/UX design principles
Established foundational frontend development skills through core web technologies: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

contact.title: Thank You
contact.description: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me using the information below.
